scripts.run: cat `find client/app -type f -name '*.coffee'` | coffee -b --no-header --compile --stdio > client/public/app.js && jade -P client/app/index.jade -o client/public/ && jade -P client/app/views/ -o client/public/views/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee server/app/server.coffee
scripts.start: cat `find client/app -type f -name '*.coffee'` | coffee -b --no-header --compile --stdio > client/public/app.js && jade -P client/app/index.jade -o client/public/ && jade -P client/app/views/ -o client/public/views/ && ./node_modules/.bin/forever -c coffee server/app/server.coffee &
scripts.stop: ./node_modules/.bin/forever stop -s `./node_modules/.bin/forever list | grep 'server/app/server.coffee' | awk '{ print $2 }' | cut -c2- | rev | cut -c2-`
